languages.text: {n}Ваши уши пронзает тонкий потусторонний звук. Тело дознавателя сводит чудовищная судорога — только путы удерживают его от того, чтобы не вывернуть себе суставы. Сначала Хейнрикс сдерживает крик, сжав зубы, но спустя пару секунд сдается — и пыточную оглашает вопль, скорее похожий на вой животного, чем крик человека.{/n}

{n}A high-pitched, otherworldly sound pierces your ears. Heinrix's body is struck by a convulsion so intense that only his bonds prevent him from dislocating his joints. He grits his teeth at first but, after a couple of seconds of this struggle, the torture chamber fills with a scream more akin to a bestial howl than any sound produced by a human being.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши уши пронзает тонкий потусторонний звук. Тело дознавателя сводит чудовищная судорога — только путы удерживают его от того, чтобы не вывернуть себе суставы. Сначала Хейнрикс сдерживает крик, сжав зубы, но спустя пару секунд сдается — и пыточную оглашает вопль, скорее похожий на вой животного, чем крик человека.{/n}

He grits his teeth at first, but, after a couple of seconds of this struggle, the torture chamber welcomes a scream more akin to a bestial howl than a sound produced by a human being.{/n}

He grits his teeth at first but, after a couple of seconds of this struggle, the torture chamber fills with a scream more akin to a bestial howl than any sound produced by a human being.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}甲高い、別世界のような音が耳を貫く。ハインリックスの身体は激しい痙攣に襲われ、拘束のおかげで、関節はなんとか外れずに済んでいる。最初は歯を食いしばっていたが、数秒の格闘の後、人間が発する音というよりも獣の遠吠えに似た悲鳴が拷問室に響いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A high-pitched, otherworldly sound pierces your ears. Heinrix's body is struck by a convulsion so intense that only his bonds prevent him from dislocating his joints. He grits his teeth at first but, after a couple of seconds of this struggle, the torture chamber fills with a scream more akin to a bestial howl than any sound produced by a human being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}甲高い、別世界のような音が耳を貫く。ハインリックスの身体は激しい痙攣に襲われ、拘束のおかげで、関節はなんとか外れずに済んでいる。最初は歯を食いしばっていたが、数秒の格闘の後、人間が発する音というよりも獣の遠吠えに似た悲鳴が拷問室に響いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}紧接着，某种极其尖锐、仿佛根本不属于这个世界的声音穿过了你的耳膜。海因里希的身体剧烈地抽搐着，如果不是因为被镣铐锁住，他恐怕已经把关节扭断了。他一开始还在咬牙切齿，但过了几秒钟之后，尖叫声便响彻整间行刑室，听起来不像是人发出的声音，更像是野兽的嚎叫。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A high-pitched, otherworldly sound pierces your ears. Heinrix's body is struck by a convulsion so intense that only his bonds prevent him from dislocating his joints. He grits his teeth at first but, after a couple of seconds of this struggle, the torture chamber fills with a scream more akin to a bestial howl than any sound produced by a human being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}紧接着，某种极其尖锐、仿佛根本不属于这个世界的声音穿过了你的耳膜。海因里希的身体剧烈地抽搐着，如果不是因为被镣铐锁住，他恐怕已经把关节扭断了。他一开始还在咬牙切齿，但过了几秒钟之后，尖叫声便响彻整间行刑室，听起来不像是人发出的声音，更像是野兽的嚎叫。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un sonido agudo y sobrenatural perfora tus oídos. El cuerpo de Heinrix sufre una convulsión tan intensa que solo sus ataduras le impiden dislocarse las articulaciones. Al principio aprieta los dientes, pero, tras un par de segundos de lucha, la cámara de tortura se hace eco de un grito más parecido a un aullido bestial que a un sonido producido por un ser humano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A high-pitched, otherworldly sound pierces your ears. Heinrix's body is struck by a convulsion so intense that only his bonds prevent him from dislocating his joints. He grits his teeth at first but, after a couple of seconds of this struggle, the torture chamber fills with a scream more akin to a bestial howl than any sound produced by a human being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sonido agudo y sobrenatural perfora tus oídos. El cuerpo de Heinrix sufre una convulsión tan intensa que solo sus ataduras le impiden retorcer las articulaciones. Al principio aprieta los dientes, pero, tras un par de segundos de lucha, la cámara de tortura se hace eco de un grito más parecido a un aullido bestial que a un sonido producido por un ser humano.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein hohes, andersweltliches Geräusch dröhnt in deinen Ohren. Heinrix' Körper wird von einem derart heftigen Krampfanfall ergriffen, dass nur seine Fesseln eine ungesunde Verrenkung seiner Gelenke verhindern. Zunächst beißt er die Zähne zusammen, doch nach einigen Sekunden dieses Kampfs ertönt in der Folterkammer ein Schrei, der eher dem Geheul eines Tiers ähnelt als dem Geräusch eines menschlichen Wesens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A high-pitched, otherworldly sound pierces your ears. Heinrix's body is struck by a convulsion so intense that only his bonds prevent him from dislocating his joints. He grits his teeth at first but, after a couple of seconds of this struggle, the torture chamber fills with a scream more akin to a bestial howl than any sound produced by a human being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein hohes, andersweltliches Geräusch dröhnt in deinen Ohren. Heinrix' Körper wird von einem derart heftigen Krampfanfall ergriffen, dass nur seine Fesseln ein ungesundes Verdrehen seiner Gelenke verhindern. Zunächst beißt er die Zähne zusammen, doch nach einigen Sekunden dieses Kampfs ertönt in der Folterkammer ein Schrei, der eher dem Geheul eines Tiers ähnelt als einem menschlichen Geräusch.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un son particulièrement aigu, presque surnaturel, vient vous percer les tympans. Heinrix est soudain pris de telles convulsions que ses articulations se briseraient s'il n'était pas solidement attaché. Au bout de quelques secondes à serrer les dents, il ne peut réprimer un hurlement bestial dont vous n'auriez jamais cru un humain capable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A high-pitched, otherworldly sound pierces your ears. Heinrix's body is struck by a convulsion so intense that only his bonds prevent him from dislocating his joints. He grits his teeth at first but, after a couple of seconds of this struggle, the torture chamber fills with a scream more akin to a bestial howl than any sound produced by a human being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un son particulièrement aigu, presque surnaturel, vient vous percer les tympans. Heinrix est soudain pris de telles convulsions que ses articulations se briseraient s'il n'était pas solidement attaché. Au bout de quelques secondes à serrer les dents, il ne peut réprimer un hurlement bestial dont vous n'auriez jamais cru un humain capable.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tiz, uhrevi bir sesle kulakların deliniyor. Heinrix'in vücudu öyle sert kasılıyor ki bağlı olmasa eklemleri yerinden çıkacak. İlk başta dişlerini sıksa da bu şekilde birkaç saniye debelendikten sonra işkence odasını, insandan ziyade bir hayvan çıkmış gibi duran bir çığlık sarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A high-pitched, otherworldly sound pierces your ears. Heinrix's body is struck by a convulsion so intense that only his bonds prevent him from dislocating his joints. He grits his teeth at first but, after a couple of seconds of this struggle, the torture chamber fills with a scream more akin to a bestial howl than any sound produced by a human being.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tiz ve uhrevi bir sesle kulakların deliniyor. Heinrix'in vücudu öylesine sert bir şekilde kasılıyor ki, bağlı olmasa eklemleri yerinden çıkacak. İlk başta dişlerini sıkıyor ancak bu şekilde sadece birkaç saniye debelendikten sonra işkence odasını saran çığlık, bir insandan ziyade bir hayvandan çıkmış gibi.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
